title: NEO-Cardano NFT Bridge [NFT-MAKER]
description: NFTs mostly live on one chain, which makes onboarding new users very hard, especially when they already own NFTs on other chains.
solution: We want to build a bridge between Cardano and NEO for NFTs and integrate that in the NFT-MAKER PRO API.
experience: Our team is behind NFT-MAKER and NFT-MAKER PRO - the two most used NFT creation tools on Cardano. In the Cardano space since 2017.
